## VerifiableCredential interface

Represents a signed Verifiable Credential payload (includes proof). See [VC data model](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#credentials)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface VerifiableCredential extends W3CCredential
```

<b>Extends:</b> [W3CCredential](./core.w3ccredential.md)
